title: 6-Pack Reusable Washing Up Sponge, Non-Scratch, Dual-Sided Kitchen and Bathroom cleaning products, 10x8cm Eco-Friendly, Long-Lasting Dish and Multi-surface Pads Cleaners
features: 6-Pack of Long-Lasting, Reusable Sponges: Made from eco-friendly materials, these sponges are 100% washer and dryer safe for effortless cleaning. They are chemical-free and safe for your family's health. A pack of 6 sponges will last for months, saving you money and reducing waste.

Dual-Sided for Versatile Cleaning: Featuring a durable scrubber side for removing grime, dried food, and 99% of bacteria, and a high-quality microfiber side for gentle cleaning and wiping away dirt, these sponges are perfect for tackling various cleaning tasks in your kitchen and bathroom.

Multi-Purpose & Efficient: Ideal for scrubbing toilets, sinks, dishes, and stovetops, these sponges provide efficient cleaning using just water. The dual-sided design makes them suitable for both tough scrubbing and delicate washing tasks.

Chemical-Free & Durable: Our sponges contain no harmful chemicals, ensuring they are 100% safe for you and your family. The pack of 6 pads will last for months, providing an eco-friendly and cost-effective cleaning solution.

Effortless & Powerful Cleaning: Tired of scrubbing away dirt and bacteria on pots and pans? Our 10x8cm sponges feature 2x stronger microfiber that effectively removes dirt and grease from various surfaces. The sponge holds soap for longer, making your cleaning tasks more efficient and enjoyable. As good as Cosmetic Sponge and body scrubber
